org.apache.beam.sdk.metrics

Class Lineage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.beam.sdk.metrics.Lineage

  • public class Lineage
extends java.lang.Object
    Standard collection of metrics used to record source and sinks information for lineage tracking.

      • getSources

      • wrapSegment

        @Internal
public static java.lang.String wrapSegment(java.lang.String value)
        Wrap segment to valid segment name.

        Specifically, If there are reserved chars (colon, whitespace, dot), escape with backtick. If the segment is already wrapped, return the original.

        This helper method is for internal and testing usage only.

      • getFqName

        @Internal
public static java.lang.String getFqName(java.lang.String system,
                                                   @Nullable java.lang.String subtype,
                                                   java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> segments)
        Assemble fully qualified name (FQN). Format:
        • system:segment1.segment2
        • system:subtype:segment1.segment2
        • system:`segment1.with.dots:clons`.segment2

        This helper method is for internal and testing usage only.

      • getFqName

        @Internal
public static java.lang.String getFqName(java.lang.String system,
                                                   java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> segments)
        Assemble the FQN of given system, and segments.

        This helper method is for internal and testing usage only.

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.String system,
                @Nullable java.lang.String subtype,
                java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> segments)
        Add a FQN (fully-qualified name) to Lineage. Segments will be processed via getFqName(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String>).

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.String system,
                java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String> segments)
        Add a FQN (fully-qualified name) to Lineage. Segments will be processed via getFqName(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.Iterable<java.lang.String>).

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.String details)
        Adds the given details as Lineage. For asset level lineage the resource location should be specified as Dataplex FQN https://cloud.google.com/data-catalog/docs/fully-qualified-names

      • query

        public static java.util.Set<java.lang.String> query(MetricResults results,
                                                    Lineage.Type type)
        Query StringSet metrics from MetricResults.
